options.code:
colorDirectory = {
  btnPrimaryBg: "#5079ffff",
  btnPrimaryBorder: "#ffffff00",
  btnPrimaryText: "#ffffffff",
  btnSecondaryBg: "#ffffffb3",
  btnSecondaryBorder: "#5079ffff",
  btnSecondaryText: "#5079ffff",
  main: "#3e63ddff",
  modalBodyBg: "#ffffff00",
  modalHeaderBg: "#3e63ddff",
  modalHeaderText: "#ffffffff",
  navbarBg: "#3e63ddff",
  navbarText: "#ffffffff",
  tabHighlight: "#3e63ddff",
};

return colorDirectory;
